# Ascend

TRANSFORMATION

INGESTION

Ascend.io is an intelligent data pipeline automation platform that streamlines the creation, operation, and maintenance of data workflows. It provides end-to-end automation, ensuring data engineers can build scalable data pipelines with minimal effort. Ascend.io leverages a unified data ingestion, transformation, and orchestration layer to simplify complex data engineering tasks.

## Ascend.io + MotherDuck

Ascend.io integrates with MotherDuck by enabling seamless data pipeline automation that connects directly to MotherDuck's cloud data warehouse. This integration allows users to effortlessly ingest, transform, and orchestrate data within MotherDuck, leveraging DuckDBâ€™s high-performance querying capabilities to optimize data processing and analytics workflows.
